task.en: In iMovie, help me create a video using the watercolor globe template to display a route from Vancouver BC Canada to Singapore. Keep the default duration of the globe template. Export with 1080p resolution, medium quality, faster compression. Save it as `Globe.mp4` under Documents.
task.zh: 在iMovie中，帮我创建一个视频，使用watercolor globe模板展示从加拿大温哥华到新加坡的路线。保留模板的默认时长。用1080p的分辨率、中等画质、faster压缩选项导出。保存到Documents下，命名为`Globe.mp4`。

pre_command: osascript -e 'quit app "iMovie"' && rm -rf "/Users/ec2-user/Movies/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" && cp -r "/Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/iMovie Library.imovielibrary" /Users/ec2-user/Movies/; rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents; osascript -e 'tell application "iMovie" to activate'
grading_command: mdls -name kMDItemVideoBitRate /Users/ec2-user/Documents/Globe.mp4 2>/dev/null | awk -F= '{ if ($2 > 13621 && $2 < 13641) { print "True" } else { print "False" } }' || echo "False"
